name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minerva (3B) Create How-To Guides in Seconds

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minerva is the easiest way to capture and share clickable instructions for anything on the internet!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Say goodbye to screenshots and red arrows.

Sharing process knowledge is a major headache. Anyone who has created process documentation for customers, for colleagues, or for training, knows this first-hand. Minerva makes it simple to share a process with anyone.

While enabled, Minerva captures the actions you take, automatically creates documentation, and collapses the process into a shareable link with clickable instructions embedded. Professional documentation creators have reported the time it takes to produce these documents is dramatically reduced, often by 10 times or more.

THIS EXTENSION IS FOR BETA TESTING.
